Module c195.c195assessment
Package c195.c195assessment.controller

Class ModifyAppointmentController

java.lang.Object
c195.c195assessment.controller.ModifyAppointmentController
public class ModifyAppointmentController extends Object
Controller for the Modify Appointment view, enabling users to update existing appointments.

  • Constructor Details

    • ModifyAppointmentController

      public ModifyAppointmentController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller. This method is called after the FXML file has been loaded. It sets up the form fields with existing appointment data and populates the choice boxes.

    • setupFormWithAppointment

      public void setupFormWithAppointment()
      Populates the form's fields with the information from the selected appointment. This includes setting values for the appointment's title, description, location, type, start and end times, contact, and customer.

    • cancelButtonHandler

      public void cancelButtonHandler(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the action of clicking the Cancel button. Returns the user to the main appointment view without applying any changes to the selected appointment.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event that triggered this method.

    • confirmButtonHandler

      public void confirmButtonHandler(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Validates the modified appointment data and, if valid, updates the appointment in the database. After successfully updating the appointment, it switches the scene back to the main appointment view. Displays alerts for any validation failures.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event that triggered this method.

    • getSelectedAppointment

      public Appointment getSelectedAppointment()
      Gets the currently selected appointment being modified. This appointment is loaded into the form fields for editing by the user.
      Returns:
      The Appointment object currently selected for modification.

    • setSelectedAppointment

      public void setSelectedAppointment(Appointment selectedAppointment)
      Sets the currently selected appointment to be modified. This method updates the controller's reference to the selected appointment, which is used to pre-populate the form fields and to identify which appointment record is being updated in the database.
      Parameters:
      selectedAppointment - The Appointment object selected by the user for modification.
